score-partwise.work-title: single words with punctuation marks in score header lead to compilation failure

miscellaneous.miscellaneous-field: Compilation with LilyPond v2.15.14 fails when an element of the score header of a converted MusicXML-file contained a single word directly followed by a punctuation mark (I tested it with '.', '!', ','. There is no problem with question marks.). Solution: musicxml2ly should automatically enclose all titles and headers in quotation marks. (Currently only the ones containing white spaces and/or question marks are enclosed in quotation marks.)
